description: This MITRE ATK galaxy map is for the tagging of MISP artifacts using MITRE ATK version 7.2 (for the Azure AD cloud platform) which includes subdomains. More information can be found directly on the MITRE ATT&CK website: https://attack.mitre.org/matrices/enterprise/cloud/azuread/ .
name: MITRE72-ATK-AZURE-AD
